text:
@SpeakerPelosi Nanacy is correct! trump needs to take action to reduce the Coronavirus nightmare. 
>A National Strategy like Obama & Biden (H1N1 & Ebola)
>Use the Defense Production Act to maximize critical PPE & lifesaving resources.
>McConnell wants to "PAUSE" on the Heroes Act--No, PASS IT!
